channel.title: Xbox 360 LIVE!
channel.description: Hey guys i have xbox live (play cod4 and ghm) and i just wanted to know who out there has xbox live and plays cod4 or GhM [size=16pt]Gamertag- ryryrox13[/size]

item.title: Xbox 360 LIVE!
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“ryry870, post:4, topic:284788”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=376380.msg2835742#msg2835742 date=1245638239]
I wish I had GH:M.
I want to get it soon, but I also want Smash Hits as well as a wired controller for Frets on Fire.

Right now most of the games I have are Guitar Hero games, namely Guitar Hero 2 (broken D:), Guitar Hero 3, Guitar Hero: World Tour and Rock Band 2. I alsio have CoD 5 and Saints Row 2. gamertag = Threevan
[/quote] well it all depends on what you like better. If you like metallicas style GET GHM!!! (P.S. its amazing)[/quote]
Lol, I have a friend that’s in love with Metallica and he bugs me to get that game like every day
I do think they are a great band, but Guitar Hero Smash Hits is going to have all the best songs from past Guitar Hero games (and in full band mode), so it’s kind of a tough choice.

Read full topic
